newsitem.title: INDIA: At least 17 killed in Indian bus accident.
newsitem.headline: At least 17 killed in Indian bus accident.

text.p: At least 17 people were killed and 55 injured on Thursday when a bus skidded off the road into a gorge in the northern Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir, police officials said.
Twelve died instantly, while seven of the injured are in a serious condition, police said.
The accident occurred in the Rajouri district, 146 km west of Jammu.
